name: Fist, Meet Face (EARLY DEMO)
description:
FIST, meet FACE is a homage to the all-time greats of side scrolling beat 'em up action. 

Made in 3 months for the Game Development Essentials course in Turku University of Applied Sciences, expect bugs and mind-numbing gameplay.

The very early demo version contains the basic gameplay loop held together with duct tape and hopes and dreams, and the first level "Streets".

CONTROLS:

WASDMovementSHIFTRunE, MOUSE1AttackQ, MOUSE2BlockF, MOUSE3Special AttackBUse ItemESCPause
